component.summary: A fast and lightweight web browser

description.p: Midori is a lightweight yet powerful web browser which runs just as well on little embedded computers named for delicious pastries as it does on beefy machines with a core temperature exceeding that of planet earth. And it looks good doing that, too. Oh, and of course it's free software.

ul.li: User scripts and styles a la Greasemonkey.
Web developer tools powered by WebKit.
